title: Mount Fuji
description: Mount Fuji is Japan's tallest peak and one of the country's most iconic landmarks. It offers breathtaking views, hiking trails, and cultural significance.

reviews.comment: Amazing place! The view was stunning and the experience was unforgettable.
Good place to visit, but a bit crowded during peak times.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Experience various trails leading to the summit.

activities.name: Photography
activities.description: Capture breathtaking views of Mount Fuji and surrounding landscapes.
